column5: Went to Guelph General Hospital last night around 10. Delivered little Evan Roland McDonald at 3:46am. 7lbs 1oz. Everything went ok. Mom and baby are doing well. Now I got three future fishing buddies. Pics to follow whenever the heck I figure out how to shrink the size.
Congrats. I have 2 boys to fish with.
How old are they? Mine are 4 2 and brand new. The oldest enjoys fishing. Hope the other two will also.
Congrats!!! You just added another two feet to the size of boat you need
WELL DONE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!congrats all round.I see a bigger boat in your future
Have to convince the wife that. may as well go real big planning on one more.
Congrats Nancur!!!   Now where are the Cohiba's? He he he I have 2 boys n a girl...It would almost be time for the meat grinder if I didnt need it for the fun!!
Congrats to you and your wife, Curt!
Alls I can do is try. I got one more chance.
I feel your joy. Best Wishes, Symon
